content: लभ्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [लभ्-कर्मणि यत्] {@--1@} Capable of being acquired or obtained, attainable, obtainable, to be reached; प्रांशुलभ्ये फले मोहादुद्बाहुरिव वामनः <ls>R. 1. 3.</ls> <ls n="R.">4. 88</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 18.</ls> {@--2@} To be found; <ls>Ku. 1. 40.</ls> {@--3@} Fit, suitable, proper. {@--4@} Intelligible. {@--5@} To be furnished or provided with.
